item.title: The New York Times Compares Trump’s Presidency To The Chinese Cultural Revolution, But Survivors Disagree
item.description: 'There are lots of Chinese Cultural Revolution survivors in this country, but The New York Times has no courage and no objectivity to talk to us.'

item.title: Trump Admin Finds Maine In Violation Of Civil Rights Law For Allowing Men In Women’s Sports

item.title: Texas Bill Seeks To Hold Big Fertility Accountable By Mandating Embryo Destruction Reports
item.description: The legislation paves the way for a semblance of transparency in an industry that has spent years evading it.

item.title: Just 10 Democrats Vote To Censure Rep. For Interrupting Trump Address To Joint Session
item.description: 'You have no mandate!' shouted Rep. Al Green from Texas as Trump opened his first joint address to Congress of a second term.
